samples.question: And do you think people spend too much time online these days?
samples.transcript: In my personal opinion, yes, they do spend a lot more time online than offline because nowadays you can do more things online than offline such as shopping, playing games with people, and interacting in general. And also I believe it is more comfortable to, you know, just click on keyboards rather than to actually do something with hands. Like making stuff or writing down poems, books, stories, such as that. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: In my personal opinion, yes, they do spend a lot more time online than offline because nowadays you can do more things online than offline such as shopping, playing games with people, and interacting in general. And also I believe it's more comfortable to, um, you know, just click on keyboards rather than to actually do something with hands. Like making stuff or writing down poems, books, stories, such as that. Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: In my personal opinion, yes, they do spend a lot more time online than offline because nowadays you can do more things online than offline such as shopping, playing games with people, and interacting in general. And also I believe it is more comfortable to, you know, just click on keyboards rather than to actually do something with hands. Like making stuff or writing down poems, books, stories, such as that.

samples.question: And what would your life be like without the internet?
samples.transcript: Oh, it would be very painful without the internet. it is practically a compass for me. it is like using a compass when I am stuck on the internet. But when I do not have my compass, it is very frustrating and I cannot usually find my way to my answers. And I feel like I get lost more often. Okay Now let talk about breakfast So what do you usually eat for breakfast I usually eat vegetables first because it more of a diet I guess that I usually do I don usually eat meat or any grains in the morning because it makes you you know it has high calories more than you know vegetables and So I decided to eat carrots, cucumbers, anything that has more fiber than, you know, grain and meat.

samples.question: Okay, so could you describe a person who thinks music is important?
samples.transcript: I would describe my father who is not really specialized in music but he does enjoy music a lot. He likes wide variety of music from electronic dance music or EDM to classic jazz or even classic music itself. And they think it makes sound part of the art category because just with normal sounds you do not really get any inspirations or anything aspiring in general. But when you add sound with another sound, it becomes a music and it makes, it is what makes sound interesting and it makes, it is what makes sound part of the art category itself. it is, it makes itself unique in general. Yeah, and to be honest, I feel like he does know what music is all about. he is just not very interested in making music itself because there are already astounding artists that make music out of any type of sounds. Yeah, that is what I believe. Okay, perfect.

He's just not very interested in making music itself because there are already astounding artists that make music out of any type of sounds. Yeah, that's what I believe. Okay, perfect.

samples.question: However, when it comes down to art classes, music can be part of what your artwork is going to be about.
samples.transcript: So sometimes it can be the whole inspiration. Sometimes it can just be a optional element. And sometimes it can be something that is crucial to your artwork. It can be a message itself. Okay.

samples.question: And do you think there are any advantages to a store playing music?
samples.transcript: I think there are plenty of advantages because sometimes when you walk around the streets you can hear musics. They sometimes attract people. They sometimes bring, they also promote the music in some way which is, Kind of part of the marketing strategy. And I believe that is a way to bring people's attention to music and the products they are promoting. Yes, yes.

They sometimes bring, um, they also promote the music in some way which is, Kind of part of the marketing strategy. And I believe that's a way to bring people's attention to music and the products they're promoting. Yes, yes.

samples.question: And do you think that affects customers' behavior?
samples.transcript: Yeah, depending on what type of music they are using. If they are in a cafe, a soothing sound like jazz or any lo-fi music would probably fit well with cafes. But other times when you are in an arcade or when you are in a mall, something bright or something very.

samples.question: Just like piece of art?
samples.transcript: Yeah, a piece of art, a piece of music, yes. so yeah, obviously songs are countable. You know, you can say I listen to a few songs, but music is always uncountable.

samples.question: Do you like your hometown?
samples.transcript: How? Well, actually, I do like it. This is Tehran. It is the capital city of Iran. Although the weather is a little bit hot, I like it. Okay.

samples.question: What insights do traveling to places bring in a person?
samples.transcript: Well, actually, I, I do love traveling because it can broaden my horizon. I can have this opportunity, to see the world differently. samples.question: And how do you plan your travel?

samples.question: Do people in your country try new gadgets and appliances in the market?
samples.transcript: Well, actually, you know, cost of living is increasing these days in Iran and because of that many people are not able, I mean, they are not, they cannot afford many different, new technologies like, I do not know, Nixer or maybe kitchen appliances because, they are becoming really expensive nowadays.
